betterquesting:10.desc:8: The §6Master Infusion Crystal§r is an §eupgraded version§r of the normal §6Infusion Crystal§r that can be crafted using four §6Prosperity Shard§rs, four §6Supremium Essence§rs, and a §6Diamond§r. It can be §eused just like it's normal counterpart§r (§7making the tier essences§r). What the normal one can't do that the Master can is §amake a block of the respective essence§r. It also has an §cunlimited§e amount of uses§r unlike the normal variant which can only be used for 1000 times.
